Game information:  


ARMA 3 - a new milestone in the genre of tactical military simulation
from independent studio Bohemia Interactive, creators of the acclaimed
Operation Flashpoint.

ARMA 3 absorbed all the best from previous games in the series and has
introduced many innovations. The new physics engine allowing the player
with unprecedented realism to manage the fighting. The new model of
behavior techniques, the broadest range of weapons, from already become
classical M16 and AK74 before prototypes are not yet enrolled in public
use, as well as the long-awaited series of fans the opportunity to swim
under water.

After several years of exhausting war, Europe has become the last refuge
of the battles weakened NATO. Stratis island captured enemy from the Middle
East and its conquest give guaranteed superiority of NATO in the region.
Start of operation "Magnitude": a small group of specially trained soldiers
with scientists undercover sent to the island in the Mediterranean Sea.

Mission in danger of collapse! The team is almost COMPLETELY destroyed,
and the main character, Captain Scott Miller washed ashore enemy island.
Complete the operation in his power, but on his way there are the dangers
of modern warfare, ruthless environment and the numerical superiority of
the enemy. Have to think about every step!

Game Features:  

New game engine allows you to control the fighting with unprecedented realism.

Now you can dive under the water!

The variety of weapons - from the "classic" AK-74 and M-16 and not yet published
in the mass production of prototypes.

By combining all the positive qualities of predecessors, with the new engine and
evolutionary capabilities, ARMA 3 provides the player with nothing comparable to
the experience of tactical combat.
Create your own game scenarios, using a simple and intuitive mission editor.


RePack Features:  

Arma 3 (III)
Game Version - v1.34 (Update 26)
